fields.original_string: private final Set<ValidationType> usedValidationTypes = Sets.immutableEnumSet(ValidationType.BUSES, ValidationType.FLOWS, ValidationType.GENERATORS);
private final Set<ValidationType> unusedValidationTypes = Sets.immutableEnumSet(ValidationType.SHUNTS, ValidationType.SVCS, ValidationType.TWTS);
final EnumMap<ValidationType, Writer> writersMap = new EnumMap<>(ValidationType.class);
final EnumMap<ValidationType, ValidationWriter> validationWritersMap = new EnumMap<>(ValidationType.class);
